Text.Page:
{@LinkCreature:247#3510#Toray} at the {@Rgn:47007$$Blightroar Research Station} sent a request for assistance. He's having trouble collecting research samples.

Your skill set makes you perfect for such a task!

I noticed a clutch of naga eggs nearby that I'm convinced came from argonomorph nagas. Think about the implications of that!

Unfortunately, without proof it's all speculation. I need samples from the eggs but—argonomorphs or not—the nagas aren't having it.

Think you could help?

Oh, yes. I can see differences in these shards.

Curious. How did the argons manage this?

First I must understand how the argons can affect a crystalline race like wendigos.

Kill any contaminated wendigos you find and collect their shards. They're the key.

Fascinating. I've wondered what physical changes occur to argonomorphs when they transition.

This should prove illuminating.

The changes to the nagas go beyond the skin, though.

I'd like to study some naga hides affected by the argonomorph process.
Yolk from a contaminated egg? Fascinating. I wonder if the argon changes pass on to later generations....

I'd like to study the contaminated naga eggs. This is the first example of an argonomorph procreating.

We must learn the threat this poses.
